meanings.definition: A person who drills for oil or gas in areas not known to contain oil or gas.
meanings.sent1: The wildcatter discovered oil in a remote location.
meanings.sent2: The wildcatter invested in drilling equipment for new oil fields.
meanings.sent3: The wildcatter's determination paid off when they struck oil unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Like a modern-day explorer, the wildcatter delved into uncharted territories for oil.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wildcatter striking black gold in the wilderness is legendary.

meanings.definition: A person who takes risks, especially in business ventures.
meanings.sent1: The wildcatter decided to invest all their savings in a risky business.
meanings.sent2: Being a wildcatter, he was always looking for the next big opportunity.
meanings.sent3: The wildcatter's bold move left everyone surprised but impressed.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the wildcatter is the one who dares to dream big.
meanings.sent5: Her reputation as a wildcatter in the business world grew as she took on more daring projects.
